name: Love Love Blush Ayaya Doki Doki Dating Weekend!
name_original: Love Love Blush Ayaya Doki Doki Dating Weekend!
description:
Welcome to Love Love Blush Ayaya Doki Doki Dating Weekend! You are GAYBRIEL, an introverted gamer and anime fan, about to go to his first gaming convention. Along the way, you meet two cute girls who seem to have taken an interest in you. Will you have a successful weekend and finally get the girl of your dreams?

Features:

-2 hours of gameplay

-original soundtrack by Ashmere

-5 endings

-unique Microsoft Powerpoint animations

-original artwork by Zugzugmine

-a variety of MoonMoon pandering jokes

________________________

PLEASE NOTE:

-this is the Game Jam version of the game! Nothing has been changed or modified from the original submission in January 2022, so there may be typos or unimbedded fonts
